content: Subscription will be automatically renewed on {{finalDate}} with updated pricing and specifications.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message indicating that a subscription will be automatically renewed on a specified date, along with updated pricing and specifications. It appears in UI elements where subscription renewal notifications are shown, such as portal settings or storage summary sections. The key's usage depends on the value of `amount`, suggesting its use in either renewal confirmation or cancellation scenarios.

usage.context:
<Text fontSize="12px">
 {nextStoragePlanSize === 0
 ? t("SubscriptionAutoCancellation", {
 finalDate: storageExpiryDate,
 })
 : t("SubscriptionAutoRenewed", {
 finalDate: storageExpiryDate,
 })}
 </Text>
 </>
 );
